item.title: Minikube with hyperkit
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: While Docker for mac in the edge channel offers a Kubernetes integration, I wanted to have the same tool as my pals on linux, who’re most likely using minikube. Minikube on OSX requires a virtual machine which is by default VirtualBox, since minikube is using the docker a the container runtime it bootstrap the VM environment with boot2docker.
